meanings.definition: A person who snivels or whines.
meanings.sent1: The playground was full of snivelers who always complained about the games.
meanings.sent2: The teacher scolded the snivelers for constantly crying over small things.
meanings.sent3: The group of snivelers at the party made everyone feel gloomy with their constant complaints.
meanings.sent4: The snivelers in the movie were portrayed as weak characters who always sought sympathy.
meanings.sent5: The image of the snivelers in the story stuck in my mind as pitiful characters.

meanings.definition: To behave in a whining or tearful manner.
meanings.sent1: Stop snivelers and face your problems with courage.
meanings.sent2: She always snivelers when she doesn't get her way.
meanings.sent3: The cat snivelers outside the door until someone lets her in.
meanings.sent4: The child snivelers for candy every time they pass a store.
meanings.sent5: The wind snivelers through the trees, creating a haunting sound.
